name: Treestoration
description:
The trees are gone. It's up to you, with the help of a little magic, to restore the trees and bring back what was lost. Search for water and nutrients in the soil, nourishing the sprout until it grows into a magnificent tree! To play, click on the root tips and click on the soil to change the root direction. Absorb the nutrients & water before the tree runs out, and see your tree grow!

Global Game Jam 2023 link: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/treestoration-3
